overview: An aging actress is magically returned to 1965 to relive the tyranny unleashed by a perverted, merciless white supremacist family, raging vengeance on her ill-fated love affair with a poetic African American civil rights advocate.
tagline: The idyllic love of a youthful interracial couple rises above the hatred unleashed by a vengefully demonic white supremacist family in Alabama, amid the conflagration of segregation during the violent 1960's.
title: Used and Borrowed Time
